1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 import rospy
4 import logging
5 from niryo_robot_utils import sentry_init
6 
7 from niryo_robot_user_interface.tcp_server import TcpServer
8 
9 from std_msgs.msg import Bool
10 
11 
12 class UserInterface:
13 
14  def __init__(self):
15  rospy.logdebug("User Interface Node - Entering in Init")
16 
17  ip_address = rospy.get_param("~ip_address", '')
18  port = rospy.get_param("~tcp_port", 40001)
19 
20  self.__is_client_connected_pub = rospy.Publisher('~is_client_connected', Bool, latch=True, queue_size=10)
21  self.__is_client_connected_pub.publish(False)
22 
23  self.__tcp_server = TcpServer(ip_address=ip_address,
24  port=port,
25  on_client_connection_cb=self.on_client_connection,
26  on_client_disconnection_cb=self.on_client_disconnection).start()
27 
28  if self.__tcp_server is not None:
29  # Set a bool to mentioned this node is initialized
30  rospy.set_param('~initialized', True)
31  rospy.loginfo("User Interface Node - Started")
32  else:
33  rospy.set_param('~initialized', False)
34  rospy.logerr("User Interface Node - Not correctly Started")
35 
36  def shutdown(self):
37  if self.__tcp_server is not None:
38  self.__tcp_server.quit()
39 
40  def on_client_connection(self):
41  self.__is_client_connected_pub.publish(True)
42 
43  def on_client_disconnection(self):
44  self.__is_client_connected_pub.publish(False)
45 
46 
47 if __name__ == '__main__':
48  sentry_init()
49 
50  rospy.init_node('niryo_robot_user_interface', anonymous=False, log_level=rospy.INFO)
51 
52  # change logger level according to node parameter
53  log_level = rospy.get_param("~log_level")
54  logger = logging.getLogger("rosout")
55  logger.setLevel(log_level)
56 
57  try:
58  ui = UserInterface()
59  rospy.on_shutdown(ui.shutdown)
60  rospy.spin()
61  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
62  pass
